to report earnings, excluding items, of$ 8.06 a share, on$ 6.05 billion in revenue. "Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year," Eric Schmidt said in a statement. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. In after-hours trading, shares of Google rose 2.1 percent to$ 639.68, despite having closed Thursday's regular session down 0.8 percent. Jane Lynch also admitted she is "amazed" by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . She explained in an interview with The Sun newspaper: Simon Cowell and Sue say the things people wish they could in their jobs or at their school, but can't because it's not the done thing. "Just like him, she says what she wants because she can- there is nobody there to tell either of them to stop. Steven Tyler re-invigorates "Idol" Newsvine- There were differing opinions on how season 10 of "American Idol would look this year, but almost everyone agreed on two points: "Idol" would sorely miss the irreplaceable Simon Cowell , and few would notice the absence of Ellen DeGeneres after her disappointing season as the fourth judge.
